page.title: 07SHERBORNE FETE
page.content: Every year in July there is a village fete.It's held on the school field on a Saturday afernoon at two o'clock there are cart rides around the village and pony rides around the field.There are stalls like clowns faces.Sweet stalls,a treasure hunt and a ice_cream stall.The fete is really good.Then Lord Sherborne's morris men come and dance.They wear a white shirt and white trousers with bells around their ankles and big black boots,they have a hat decorated with flowers and some ribbons.The chidren at the school also do a dance while the morris men go and have a cup of tea.A lot of people come to the fete in the afternoon. It starts at two o'clock and ends at five.Just before the finish, the raffle prizes are given out.
